attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: STOP postcode lottery for every drug/treatment/level of care in the uk so that everyone get treated the same no matter where they live. There is no local national insurance so there should be no difference in health care

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/postcodelottery/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
